Metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11358 affecting package m2crypto for versions less than 0.38.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2019-11358 affecting package m2crypto for versions less than 0.38.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package m2crypto is earlier than 0.38.0-4, affected by CVE-2019-11358
